snippet: Kyu Nakama, a senior at Brooklyn Technical High School in New York City, considered familiarity, location and quality of education of his top picks before making a college decision.
abstract: Kyu Nakama, a senior at Brooklyn Technical High School in New York City, considered familiarity, location and quality of education of his top picks before making a college decision.

headline.main: After Careful Analysis, Campus 'Vibe' Determined My Choice
